overview: Mix magical universe of Juan Rulfo, in which Juan Preciado, "Pedro Paramo", located incestuous siblings "Talpa" while Juvencio Nava, of "Diles que no me maten", flee several men who pursue for killing Colonel Terrones.

production_companies.name: Dirección General de Actividades Cinematográficas de la UNAM

title: Los confines
